alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Erath; Hamilton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton, southeastern Erath and west central Bosque Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hico, or 15 miles north of Hamilton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hico, Fairy, Olin, Carlton and Clairette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
